Name: rh| Ediff
Creator: Michael KiferMichael Kifer
Windows: YesEdiff requires a diff utility to function.  As of December 2017, diff is not bundled with Emacs or Windows, so use of Ediff in a Windows environment requires installation of both Emacs and a diff implementation like GNU diff.
